body_html: I actually just tried it locally and it works for both build develop and install. Our CI starts from a fresh ubuntu docker image so it's pretty unbiased. Looking at setup.py, this looks legit: build_deps is called directly from install and build
body_text: I actually just tried it locally and it works for both build develop and install. Our CI starts from a fresh ubuntu docker image so it's pretty unbiased. Looking at setup.py, this looks legit: build_deps is called directly from install and build
body: I actually just tried it locally and it works for both `build develop` and `install`. Our CI starts from a fresh ubuntu docker image so it's pretty unbiased. Looking at `setup.py`, this looks legit: `build_deps` is called directly from `install` and `build`
